name: Two Rooms
description:
Two Rooms is the perfect companion timer for the social interaction game "Two Rooms and a Boom".

• Press one button only to play.

• Use it as the leader card in each room.

• See at a glance how many exchanges you have to do each round.

A beautiful voice warns you before the round ends.
Two Rooms has no pause button to prevent cheating. Use in conjunction with the Guided Access System Setting if you want to lock your device while playing the game.

NOTE: Two Rooms is solely an aid for playing the real game by Tuesday Knights Games, which is not included. You can download or order a version of the game on the Tuesday Knights Games Website. The Two Rooms app is not affiliated with Tuesday Knights Games.

Thanks to Tuesday Knights Games for the support and for making such an awesome game.
